mapper.select: SELECT B.id, B.book_name AS bookName, B.book_text AS bookText, B.author, B.book_icon AS bookIcon, B.tag, B.created_at AS createTime, R.count, CASE WHEN #{account} = '' THEN 0 WHEN f.update_time IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS isLike FROM `rank` R LEFT JOIN `book` B ON B.id = R.id LEFT JOIN `favorite` f ON B.id = f.id AND f.account = #{account} ORDER BY R.count DESC
